00024 // Helper functions
00025 std::string strlwr(const std::string& s)
00026 {
00027  std::string res = s;
00028  stringlwr(res);
00029  return res;
00030 }
00031 
00032 /////////////////////
00033 // Adjusts the blank characters so that there are no repeated blank characters and the blank characters are all
00034 // turned to spaces
00035 void StringBuf::adjustBlank()
00036 {
00037  // Check
00038  if (sStr.size() < 3)
00039   return;
00040  
00041  // Initialize iterators
00042  std::string::const_iterator it = sStr.begin();
00043  std::string::const_iterator prev = it;
00044  it++;
00045  
00046  // Get the adjusted string
00047  std::string res;
00048  res += *sStr.begin(); // First character, sStr != "" here
00049  for (; it != sStr.end(); it++, prev++)  {
00050   if (isspace((unsigned char)*it))  {  // Blank
00051    if (isspace((unsigned char)*prev)) // Previous also blank, ignroe
00052     continue;
00053    else  { // Previous not blank, convert to space and add
00054     res += ' ';
00055     continue;
00056    }
00057   }
00058   res += *it; // Normal character
00059  }
00060  
00061  sStr = res;
00062  tPos = sStr.begin();
00063 }
00064 
00065 /////////////////////
00066 // Trims all blank characters from both sides of the string
00067 void StringBuf::trimBlank()
00068 {
00069  // Start
00070  while (sStr.size() && isspace((unsigned char)(*(sStr.begin()))))
00071   sStr.erase(sStr.begin());
00072  
00073  // End
00074  while (sStr.size() && isspace((unsigned char)(*(sStr.rbegin()))))
00075   sStr.erase(sStr.size() - 1, 1);
00076  
00077  tPos = sStr.begin();
00078 }
00079 
00080 ////////////////////
00081 // Tokenizes the string buffer by blank characters, multiple blank characters are taken as one
00082 std::vector<std::string> StringBuf::splitByBlank()
00083 {
00084  std::vector<std::string> res;
00085  std::string token;
00086  bool was_space = false;
00087  for (std::string::iterator it = sStr.begin(); it != sStr.end(); it++)  {
00088   if (isspace((unsigned char)(*it)))  {
00089    if (was_space) // Multiple spaces get ignored
00090     continue;
00091    else  {
00092     res.push_back(token); // Add the token
00093     token = "";
00094    }
00095    
00096    was_space = true;
00097    continue;
00098   }
00099   
00100   was_space = false;
00101   token += *it;
00102  }
00103  
00104  // Last token
00105  res.push_back(token);
00106  
00107  return res;
00108 }
00109 
00110 ////////////////////
00111 // Tokenizes the string buffer by blank the specified character
00112 std::vector<std::string> StringBuf::splitBy(char c)
00113 {
00114  std::vector<std::string> res;
00115  std::string token;
00116  for (std::string::iterator it = sStr.begin(); it != sStr.end(); it++)  {
00117   if (*it == c)  {
00118    res.push_back(token); // Add the token
00119    token = "";
00120    continue;
00121   }
00122   
00123   token += *it;
00124  }
00125  
00126  // Last token
00127  res.push_back(token);
00128  
00129  return res;
00130 }
00131 
00132 ////////////////////////
00133 // Reads until the specified character and skips it
00134 std::string StringBuf::readUntil(char c)
00135 {
00136  std::string res;
00137  while (!atEnd() && *tPos != c)  {
00138   res += *tPos;
00139   incPos();
00140  }
00141  
00142  // Skip the breaking character
00143  if (!atEnd())
00144   incPos();
00145  
00146  return res;
00147 }
00148 
00149 ////////////////////////
00150 // Reads until one of the characters specified in char_array, NOT until the string in char_array
00151 std::string StringBuf::readUntil(const std::string& char_array)
00152 {
00153  std::string res;
00154  while (!atEnd() && char_array.find(*tPos) == std::string::npos)  {
00155   res += *tPos;
00156   incPos();
00157  }
00158  
00159  // Skip the breaking character
00160  if (!atEnd())
00161   incPos();
00162  
00163  return res;
00164 }
00165 
00166 /////////////////////////
00167 // Reads the specified number of bytes from the buf
00168 std::string StringBuf::read(size_t num)
00169 {
00170  std::string::iterator oth = tPos;
00171  SafeAdvance(tPos, num, sStr.end());
00172  return std::string(tPos, oth);
00173 }
00174 
00175 ///////////////////////
00176 // Skips any blank characters
00177 size_t StringBuf::skipBlank()
00178 {
00179  size_t res = 0;
00180  while (!atEnd() && isspace((unsigned char)(*tPos))) {
00181   ++res;
00182   incPos();
00183  }
00184  return res;
00185 }

00187 /////////////////////
00188 // Converts the buffer to lower case
00189 void StringBuf::toLower()
00190 {
00191  stringlwr(sStr);
00192 }

00194 /////////////////////
00195 // Prints the contents to stdout
00196 void StringBuf::debugPrint()
00197 {
00198  notes << sStr << endl << endl;
00199 }
